p: Data were collected in both intervention and control classes one week before and one week after the PCS (Figure 1). Students accessed and completed an online survey (Unipark Version 21.2, QuestBack GmbH, Oslo, Norway) at both time points via a link/QR code provided in the invitation leaflet, using their private devices during school hours. A paper-and-pencil version with the same content was also offered. To minimise loss to follow-up, we sent two reminders to encourage participation. Teachers were invited to complete a teacher protocol sheet assessing the number of eligible students and problems during the evaluation process.
